settings.testimonial: I strength train and I have been working out for more than 10 years now. I have been taking wellcore monohydrate Creatine for more than a year now. It actually improved my overall performance in the gym and helped me in building muscle. Although I have an athletic physique and looked great before Creatine, however the combination of Creatine and my workouts have considerably heightened my physical appearance and have gained more muscle mass.

This preworkout has to be the best and I guess it doesn‚Äôt really have any competition from other brands , The pump was so insane and the taste was also good . Everything is upto the mark and it is something an individual involved in high intensity workout looks for.10/10üî•

I have been working out for 3 years. And in the time that I have taken Wellcore creatine it has helped me build muscle using the water you take when working out. Water is important when taking creatine monohydrate because it uses water to build muscle as I mentioned. It improved my overall performance in the gym and helped me in building muscle. I strength train and I have been taking Creatine for more than a year now and have literally not had a negative experience since I started taking wellcore monohydrate creatine, It is the safest creatine that I have ever used.
The Best Pre workout in this Budget, Amazing Pump and Energy.üî•

I've been using Youwefit‚Äôs triple-strength fish oil for the past 5 months, and I haven‚Äôt faced any issues like any other fish oils on the market, like fish burps or any kind of digestion issues. Regular use aids in faster recovery, reduces muscle soreness, and improves joint flexibility, allowing athletes to train harder and perform better. settings.custom_liquid:
Best Bodybuilding & Gym Supplements Online


Consuming proper dietary requirements is critical for maintaining optimal health, growth, and function throughout life. Our body gets energy from the food we eat and the drinks we consume. The misapplication of any vital nutrients in the body can be problematic for healthy individuals and ageing adults, as well as for those with pathophysiological conditions that require higher protein needs. Thus, Wellversed brings the best bodybuilding supplements that maximise human potential with authentic nutrition products.

We strive to get the best quality clean nutrition that your body deserves.

Best Bodybuilding Supplements at Wellversed Necessary for Muscle Growth

Muscles allow body movement, offer strength, and protect the body from injuries. Maximising muscle growth and development is crucial. A balanced diet and regular exercise can help to some extent. However, certain dietary supplements help you achieve the desired results in a wholesome way. Whether your goal is body-building or it is about getting stronger, the best fitness supplements by Wellversed empower you physically as well as mentally.

While the specific supplement requirement may vary from person to person, there are some highly recommended sports and fitness supplements worth considering if you wish to be a better version of yourself every day. Following are the expert-suggested, necessary nutrition supplements at Wellversed:

1. Wellcore - Micronised Creatine Monohydrate:

Creatine is found in low amounts in red meat and fish and is even produced in our bodies in small amounts. Supplementing with Creatine starts with a loading phase, wherein 0.3 grams per kilogram of body weight can be taken each day. This phase lasts 5-7 days. Later, the dosage is fixed to 0.03 grams per kilogram of body weight each day, calling it a maintenance phase.

Wellcore creatine monohydrate supplementation helps in increasing muscle performance and strength, which in turn, empowers you for high-intensity workouts. It is a 100% pure, unflavoured Creatine that is an excellent supplement to boost athletic performance and power.

2. YouWeFit Omega-3 Fish Oil:

Fish oil is a highly versatile supplement with a strong potential to enhance overall well-being. As the name suggests, it is rich in omega-3 fatty acids that do wonders for our bodies.

It supports joint and heart health, along with lowering cholesterol and blood pressure. Daily consumption also helps in improving mental strength and maintaining eyesight. In the case of pregnant women and developing babies, fish oil capsules promote healthy growth. YouWeFit triple-strength Omega-3 fish oil capsules are a complete power-packed nutrition source for an elevated lifestyle without giving you fishy burps! 

3. Wellcore - Electrolytes:

Electrolytes play a crucial role in balancing the pH and water levels in your body. They ensure the movement of nutrients to the cells and the transport of waste out of the cell body. All our body‚Äôs function is maintained with the correct balance of electrolytes. furthermore, electrolyte-enhanced waters, especially sports drinks, benefit athletes by helping replenish water, electrolytes and energy lost during exercise.

Wellcore zero-sugar electrolyte powder is a keto electrolyte that derives sustainable energy from fat. Packed with 5 vital electrolytes, this orange-flavoured powder can be a powerhouse for keeping you active throughout the day.

4. Ketofy - Keto Flour (1kg):

Cutting carbs is one of the most effective ways to lose weight. Our brain needs glucose to function. Thus, our liver produces glucose from protein if we don‚Äôt eat any carbs.  But staying hungry for long makes you feel miserable. A healthy substitute to a high-carb diet and a healthy alternative for gluten-sensitive people, Ketofy keto flour, comprises all the vital superfoods, like sunflower seeds, almonds, peanuts, etc. It is the best carb-control supplement that contains 0.6g net carbohydrates/chapati. It is an ultra-low GI keto atta that helps manage weight and control sugar levels.

5. YouWeFit - Whey Protein (2 lbs/ 907g):

The most popular bodybuilding supplement is whey protein powder. It is a wholesome protein source packed with 24g Protein, 4.5g BCAA, and essential amino acids. YouWeFit Whey Protein is an easily digestible protein powder that can be taken by both men and women. 

An adequate intake of protein powder stimulates muscle protein synthesis and lowers muscle protein breakdown. This, in turn, leads to a positive increase in muscle mass. Simply add a scoop of this blueberry flavour protein powder to your shakes or smoothies to maintain your everyday protein requirement.

Dynamite Pre-Workout (420g, 30 Servings):

The key ingredient in most pre-workout products is caffeine, which can be great if taken in an advised and appropriate amount. One serving of Dynamite pre-workout contains 200mg of caffeine, which stimulates the body‚Äôs central nervous system and helps improve reaction time. Each serving also comprises 200 mg of Alpha GPC, 6500mg of citrulline complex, and 1000mg of Creatine, which can reduce fatigue. 

Perfectly consumable for both men and women, this sports nutrition supplement improves your exercise performance and helps you recover faster after a workout

While specific nutritional needs vary from person to person, these body-building supplements help promote fitness and performance as per your goals.

Wellversed: Your Trusted Online Sports Supplement Store in India

We are India‚Äôs leading online supplement store, offering expertly formulated and clinically backed formulations. Our range of products has proven results in supporting optimal organ health, boosting energy, and promoting overall well-being. We host products from various renowned brands like Wellcore, YouWeFit, Dynamite, Ketofy and Zero Sugar. 

The supplements you order online from Wellversed are a suite of cutting-edge performance-based formulas developed using the finest ingredients and following top-notch quality control standards. Our bodybuilding supplements can be your best choice if your goal is to build strength, muscle, and power and achieve the solid physical fitness and physique aesthetics possible. Let your nutritionist decide the dosage while you order fitness supplements online, coming from trusted brands.

Frequently Asked Questions:

For beginners, it is important to focus on a balanced diet first. It is not advised to start taking supplements without expert supervision. However, if you are going for regular muscle training or power exercise, then protein powder and creatine can be your best buddies. You may also keep a check on your carb intake by replacing normal wheat chapati with keto flour chapati.

You can safely order the best quality, authentic fitness supplements online from Wellversed. Whey protein, muscle gain, pre/post-workout essentials, and any other nutritional supplement you need, Wellversed is India‚Äôs trusted one-stop online shop for supplements.

When we exercise, our bodies utilise carbohydrates to form energy. After the carbohydrates are burnt completely, our body begins to break down fat for fuel. If the physical activity is continued after that, our body begins to break down skeletal muscle protein for glucose production. Rigorous physical activities like weight training and high-intensity workouts cause structural damage to muscle fibres. This is where the role of supplements comes into play. Best bodybuilding and fitness supplements are designed to provide energy and aid endurance throughout a workout.

Workout supplements enhance exercise performance for high-intensity, strenuous physical activity. However, a healthy diet with adequate carbohydrates, protein, and water is also necessary to fuel the body for moderate amounts of physical activity. You should consult with a doctor before incorporating any sports supplement into your exercise routine and discuss any potential problems, considering your medical conditions.
